title: [BUG] Icon lose quality in the Marketplace
body:
Hi,
the biggest icon size requited is 200x200 bit in the Marketplace single App page this is resized to 240x240 losing quality.

comments.body: Totally agree, icon on the market need to be clean and sharp to be attractive. This blurry effect kill the felling of quality.
Absolutely! In the web maketplace they are resized to 228px, which makes them blurry. Please allow us devs to submit larger versions of the icon/tile.
